name: Craft the cactus
description:
All Graphics by https://kenney.nl/

How to play:

- Use mouse to move Pad.

- Use items in inventory to launch it

- Craft items by selecting them in inventory

- To get to next levels you have to craft  and use keys

- Axes break wood, Weapons break monsters, Shovels break bricks

-------------------------

Has a bug, silver and golden shovel does not work. Fixed in android and windows postjam versions

-------------------------

Made for Kenneyjam 2019.

Game combines Arcanoid with crafting.

----------------------------

Use "o" button to cheat if you're stuck.

Might not be fully tested.
